caption.title: Glial cells and mature neurons express HS and SCARB2.
caption.p: Co-localisation of HS expressing cells (stained in red) with (A) glial cells (stained in green) and (B) neurons (stained in green). Co-localisation of SCARB2 expressing cells (stained in green) with (C) glial cells (stained in red) or (D) neurons (stained in red). For each panel subpanel showing cell nuclei and merged images are also shown. Scale bar = 20 Î¼m.
